      • addClazzCommunication

        public static void addClazzCommunication(Clazz caller,
                                         Clazz callee,
                                         Application application,
                                         int requests,
                                         double average,
                                         double overallTraceDuration,
                                         long traceId,
                                         int orderIndex,
                                         java.lang.String operationName)
        Adds a clazz communication or runtime information to a specific clazz within an application
        Parameters:
        caller - (calling clazz)
        callee - (called clazz)
        application - (related application)
        requests - (amount of observed calls)
        average - (average response time in ns)
        overallTraceDuration - (in ns)
        traceId - (of the reconstructed trace)
        orderIndex - (position within the trace)
        operationName - (name of the called operation)
